name: Cloner (Nochlesss)
description:
Your phonebook has been spammed by professor Harvey's missed calls. It seems like he wants you in his lab again.

Cloner is a game about completing levels by using time-recorded clones. Kindda like sokuban but instead of pushing boxes you record your steps and bend timespace itself! 

Controls:

WASD or Arrows to Move

L to record

K to summon clone

Alt-F4
